page.description: Find a search text in text - if found, return true, else return false.
page.discussion: *ANY() returns .T. (TRUE) if Find_Stringis found anywhere in Search_In_String. The comparison of Search_In_Stringto Find_Stringis case sensitive.
page.example: *any(MYCOLOR, "BLUE") -> TRUE, if the character string "BLUE" occurs anywhere in the MYCOLOR field
